price: यही है वह जहन्नम, जिसे अपराधी लोग झुठलाते थे।
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
